title: Spike Feresten!
description:
Spike is the host of "Spike's Car Radio", creator of the TV show, "Car Matchmaker", a collector of fine Porsches and watches, and a former writer on "Seinfeld."

www.podcastone.com/spikes-car-radio

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/-GOpgHECb5U

Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @spikeferesten
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @spikeferesten

NEW SHIRTS!
https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
